FuncDef: This command configures the profile to be used for the internal PTP clock. It defines the Best Master Clock Algorithm (BMCA) behavior.

ParaDef.Info: Conforms to the ITU-T G.8265.1 specification.
Conforms to the 2008 version of the IEEE1588 standard.
Conforms to the ITU-T G.8275.1 specification.
